CustomField.formula: IF (Non_Repaid_Drawdown_Principal_Total__c + Interest_Accrued_as_of_Reserve_Date__c - Reserve_Amount__c - Interest_Repaid_After_Reserve_Date__c < 0.0, 0.0, Non_Repaid_Drawdown_Principal_Total__c + Interest_Accrued_as_of_Reserve_Date__c - Reserve_Amount__c - Interest_Repaid_After_Reserve_Date__c)
CustomField.label: Reserve Exposure
